bibl.title: Piankhy's Conquest of Egypt in Greek Sources: Herodotus II 137-140 Revisited.
bibl.note: HERODOTUS II, 137-140. - Proposes to identify Sabacon with Piankhy, the Kushite (pre) 25th Dynasty king who conquered Egypt (c. 728 BC) and his adversary, Anysis with Tefnakht.
bibl.seg: KAHN Dan'el, Piankhy's Conquest of Egypt in Greek Sources: Herodotus II 137-140 Revisited.
HERODOTUS II, 137-140. - Proposes to identify Sabacon with Piankhy, the Kushite (pre) 25th Dynasty king who conquered Egypt (c. 728 BC) and his adversary, Anysis with Tefnakht.
